name: Tito El Bambino
description: '''Efraín David Fines Nevares''' (born October 5, 1981), known professionally as '''Tito El Bambino''', is a Puerto Rican singer and songwriter who rose to fame as part of the duo [[Héctor & Tito]]. In 2010, his song "[[El Amor (Tito El Bambino song)|El Amor]]", written with Joan Ortiz Espada, was awarded Latin Song of the Year by the [[American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers]] (ASCAP). He was awarded Songwriter of the Year at the 2011 ASCAP.
